contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|Magnolia|magnolia|magnólia}} '''''Magnolia''''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Plants== '''[[Magnolia]]''' is a genus of flowering plants. ==Places in the United States== ===In Alabama=== *[[Magnolia, Alabama]] ===In Arkansas=== *[[Magnolia, Arkansas]] ===In California=== *Magnolia, California, former name of [[Inyokern, California]] ===In Delaware=== *[[Magnolia, Delaware]] ===In Florida=== *[[Magnolia, Florida]] ===In Illinois=== *[[Magnolia, Illinois]] *[[Magnolia Township, Putnam County, Illinois]] ===In Iowa=== *[[Magnolia, Iowa]] *[[Magnolia Township, Harrison County, Iowa]] ===In Louisiana=== *[[Magnolia (Schriever, Louisiana)]], [[National Register of Historic Places listings in Terrebonne Parish, Louisiana|listed on the National Register of Historic Places in Terrebonne Parish, Louisiana]] ===In Massachusetts=== *Magnolia, a neighborhood of [[Gloucester, Massachusetts]] ===In Minnesota=== *[[Magnolia, Minnesota]] *[[Magnolia Township, Rock County, Minnesota]] ===In Mississippi=== *[[Magnolia, Mississippi]] ===In New Jersey=== *[[Magnolia, New Jersey]] ===In North Carolina=== *[[Magnolia, North Carolina]] *[[Magnolia Township, Duplin County, North Carolina]] *[[Magnolia (Scotland Neck, North Carolina)]], [[National Register of Historic Places listings in Halifax County, North Carolina|listed on the NRHP in Halifax County, North Carolina]] ===In Ohio=== *[[Magnolia, Ohio]] ===In South Carolina=== *[[Magnolia (Bennettsville, South Carolina)]], listed on the National Register of Historic Places in South Carolina *[[Magnolia (Gadsden, South Carolina)]], [[National Register of Historic Places listings in Richland County, South Carolina|listed on the NRHP in Richland County, South Carolina]] ===In Texas=== *[[Magnolia, Texas]] ===In Washington=== *[[Magnolia, Seattle]], Washington, a neighborhood ===In West Virginia=== *[[Magnolia, West Virginia]] ===In Wisconsin=== *[[Magnolia, Wisconsin]], a town **[[Magnolia (community), Wisconsin]], an unincorporated community ==Other== '''Magnolia''' may also refer to: * [http://magnoliaroleplays.forumotion.com/ Magnolia Roleplays] A play by post roleplaying forum. * [[Magnolia (color)]], an off-white color * [[Magnolia (CMS)]], an Open Source java-based Content Management System * [[Magnolia (film)|''Magnolia'' (film)]], 1999 film by Paul Thomas Anderson ** [[Magnolia (soundtrack)|''Magnolia'' (soundtrack)]], soundtrack for the film ** [[Magnolia (score)|''Magnolia'' (score)]], score for the film *[[Magnolia (Lúcia Moniz album)]] * [[Ma.gnolia]], social bookmarking website * [[1060 Magnolia]], asteroid * Magnolia, cultivar of [[Muscadine#Cultivars|muscadine]] * [[Magnolia Ice Cream]] * [[Magnolia Pictures]], a U.S. film distributor specializing in independent films. * [[Magnolia Warbler]], a bird species * [[Magnolia (oil platform)]] in the Gulf of Mexico * {{USS|Augusta|1853}}, a US Navy ship later renamed ''Magnolia'' * Magnolia Breeland is a fictional character on the TV series ''[[Hart of Dixie]]'' and is played by [[Claudia Lee]] ==See also== *[[The Magnolias]] *[[Magnolia Township (disambiguation)]] *{{intitle|Magnolia}} {{Disambiguation|geo}}
